yawn.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
yawn.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to be or become wide open, especially in a frightening way
yawn.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The pit yawned open in front of them.
the yawning gap between the two cliffs
yawn.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Kay shook her head and stifled a yawn  (=tried to stop yawning).
